titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the classification of certain cigars.
To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the classification of certain cigars.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the article description for certain cigars to provide for the duty treatment of cigars certified as handmade and each valued 23 cents or over.
